title: 87/9/EEC: Commission Decision of 10 December 1986 approving an addendum to the programme relating to the cereals sector in Ireland pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 355/77 (Only the English text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 10 December 1986
approving an addendum to the programme relating to the cereals sector in Ireland pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 355/77
(Only the English text is authentic)
(87/9/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The addendum to the programme relating to the cereals sector in Ireland, forwarded by the Irish Government on 19 August 1986 pursuant to Regulation (EEC) No 355/77, is hereby approved, with the exception of any increase in capacity in the feedingstuffs sector.
This Decision is addressed to Ireland.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 10 December 1986.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
